mapper.select: SELECT jk.pnu, ST_AsText(jk.geom) AS geomText, jk.jimk as code, jk.jimk_nm as code_nm, jk.area FROM public.vw_lrgtn101_jimk jk WHERE ST_Intersects( ST_SetSRID(jk.geom, 5186), ( SELECT ST_Transform(geom, 5186) AS transformed_geom FROM public.adm WHERE adm.sp_b_code = #{umdCode} LIMIT 1 ) )

SELECT jk.pnu, ST_AsText(jk.geom) AS geomText, jk.own_gbn as code, jk.own_code_nm as code_nm, jk.area FROM public.vw_lrgtn101_own jk WHERE ST_Intersects( ST_SetSRID(jk.geom, 5186), ( SELECT ST_Transform(geom, 5186) AS transformed_geom FROM public.adm WHERE adm.sp_b_code = #{umdCode} LIMIT 1 ) )

SELECT jk.pnu, ST_AsText(jk.geom) AS geomText, jk.jimk as code, jk.jimk_nm as code_nm, jk.area FROM public.vw_lrgtn101_jimk jk WHERE ST_Intersects( ST_SetSRID(jk.geom, 5186), ST_Transform( ST_GeomFromText('${geomText}', 3857), 5186) )

SELECT jk.pnu, ST_AsText(jk.geom) AS geomText, jk.own_gbn as code, jk.own_code_nm as code_nm, jk.area FROM public.vw_lrgtn101_own jk WHERE ST_Intersects( ST_SetSRID(jk.geom, 5186), ST_Transform( ST_GeomFromText('${geomText}', 3857), 5186) )
